    • Constructor Detail

      • HDrive

        public HDrive(Motor mLeft,
              Motor mRight,
              Motor slide)
        Constructor for the H-Drive class, which requires at least three motors.
        Parameters:
        mLeft - one of the necessary primary drive motors
        mRight - one of the necessary primary drive motors
        slide - the necessary slide motor for the use of h-drive

      • HDrive

        public HDrive(Motor mLeft,
              Motor mRight,
              Motor slide,
              double leftMotorAngle,
              double rightMotorAngle,
              double slideMotorAngle)
        The constructor that includes the angles of the motors.

        The default angles are 1.0471975511965976, 2.0943951023931953, 4.71238898038469.

        Parameters:
        mLeft - one of the necessary primary drive motors
        mRight - one of the necessary primary drive motors
        slide - the necessary slide motor for the use of h-drive
        leftMotorAngle - the angle of the left motor in radians
        rightMotorAngle - the angle of the right motor in radians
        slideMotorAngle - the angle of the slide motor in radians

      • HDrive

        public HDrive(Motor... myMotors)
        Sets up the constructor for the holonomic drive.
        Parameters:
        myMotors - The motors in order of: frontLeft, frontRight, backLeft, backRight. Do not input in any other order.
